B2 a piece of women's or girls' underwear that covers the area between the waist, or just below it, and the tops of the legs : All she was wearing was a pair of panties and a bra. See also
panty
More examplesFewer examplesThe apparel line includes bras, panties, and shapewear.The shorts were so short they were more like panties.The boys went red at the mere mention of the word "panties".
